alert.note: Alert for Central La Paz; Kofa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 24 at 1:56AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Arizona, including the following areas, Central La Paz and Kofa. * WHEN...From late tonight through late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Weather disturbances are expected to interact with abundant moisture to create occasions with heavy rain in the Monday through Tuesday night time frame. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
